Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.message

package it.polimi.ingsw.network.message
  • Class
    Description
    ActionChoiceMessage
    This Message is used to communicate the player's choice (Character Card or student movement) during an Action Phase of an Expert mode match.
    AskMessage
    This Message is used when the Server asks for the next move to a player.
    AskType
    This enumeration contains the values that represent what the Server may be asking for.
    AssistantCardMessage
    This Message is used to communicate which Assistant Card has been chosen.
    CharacterCardMessage
    This Message is used to communicate which parameter-less Character Card has been chosen.
    CharacterCardMessageArrayListString
    This Message is used to communicate which Character Card requesting an ArrayList parameter has been chosen, along with the given parameters.
    CharacterCardMessageInt
    This Message is used to communicate which Character Card requesting an int parameter has been chosen, along with the given parameters.
    CharacterCardMessageString
    This Message is used to communicate which Character Card requesting a String parameter has been chosen, along with the given parameters.
    CharacterCardMessageStringInt
    This Message is used to communicate which Character Card requesting a String and an int parameter has been chosen, along with the given parameters.
    CloudChoiceMessage
    This Message is used to communicate which cloud has been chosen by a player at the end of their Action Phase.
    CreateGameMessage
    This Message is used to communicate the parameters of the game the client wishes to create.
    DisconnectionMessage
    This Message is used to communicate to the connected players that a player has disconnected.
    EndGameMessage
    This Message is used to communicate to the players that the match they are playing has ended.
    ErrorMessage
    This Message is used to communicate a generic error to the clients.
    GamePhaseMessage
    This Message is used to communicate to the client a change of phase during a match.
    GameStatusFirstActionPhaseMessage
    This Message is used to communicate the current game status to the players.
    GameStatusMessage
    This Message is used to communicate the current game status to the players.
    GenericMessage
    This Message is used to communicate to the clients generic messages that need to be notified.
    JoinGameMessage
    This Message is used to communicate the ID of the game the client wishes to join.
    LoginRequest
    This Message is used to communicate to the server the nickname chosen by the client, in order to enter the lobby.
    Message
    This abstract class defines everything that a message surfing the network should have.
    MessageType
    This enumeration contains all the message types available and used by the server and clients.
    MotherNatureStepsMessage
    This Message is used to communicate how many steps the player wishes Mother Nature to move of.
    MoveToIslandMessage
    This Message is used to communicate which student the player wishes to move to which island.
    MoveToTableMessage
    This Message is used to communicate which student the player wishes to move to its table.
    PlayerNumberMessage
    This Message is used to communicate how many players a newborn game should have.
    ShowDeckMessage
    This Message is used to communicate to the client the player's Assistant Card deck, so that it is correctly shown.
    ShowExistingGamesMessage
    This Message is used to communicate to the clients the games currently present on the server.
    UpdateMessage
    This Message is used to communicate to the players who are waiting for their turn the actions done by the current player.
    WizardIDMessage
    This Message is used to communicate to the server the ID of the wizard chosen by the client.
